document_data.name: Bale's Bones
document_data.mainbody: '''Bale's Bones''' was a [[tavern]] located in the city of [[Luthcheq]] in [[Chessenta]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4420 Luthcheq}}
document_data.Location: The tavern was located near the center of Luthcheq just east of the ruins of an abandoned [[wizard]]'s tower.
